doc:
Steve Landesberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Landesberg 0 Steve Landesberg (November 23, 1936 – December 20, 2010) was an American actor, comedian, and voice actor known for his role as the erudite, unflappable police detective Arthur P. Dietrich on the ABC sitcom Barney Miller, for which he was nominated for three Emmy Awards. Steve_Landesberg ( November_23_,_1936 – December_20_,_2010 ) was an_American_actor , comedian , and voice_actor known for his_role as the_erudite_,_unflappable_police_detective_Arthur_P._Dietrich on the_ABC_sitcom_Barney_Miller , for which he was_nominated for three_Emmy_Awards .
